mapper.select: select role.rname from role where rid in (select user_role.rid from user_role where u_id = (select users.u_id from users where u_loginname =#{username}))

select a.pername from permission a inner join role_permission rp on a.pid = rp.pid inner join role r on rp.rid = r.rid inner join user_role ur on r.rid = ur.rid inner join users u on ur.u_id = u.u_id where u_loginname =#{username}
